Virtual Toothbrush: Create a virtual toothbrush app that allows users to brush their teeth virtually. The app can display a toothbrush with different colors and designs, and users can use their fingers to brush their virtual teeth. The app can also track brushing time and provide feedback on brushing technique.

Toothbrush for People with Disabilities: Design a specialized toothbrush for people with disabilities. The toothbrush can be designed with larger bristles or a different shape to make it easier for people with limited mobility or dexterity to brush their teeth. The toothbrush can also have a built-in timer and pressure sensor to ensure proper brushing technique.

Smart Toothbrush: Create a smart toothbrush that connects to a mobile app and provides real-time feedback on brushing technique. The toothbrush can have built-in sensors that track brushing speed, pressure, and duration, and provide personalized feedback and recommendations for improvement. The app can also track brushing habits and provide reminders to brush regularly.

Interactive Toothbrush: Design an interactive toothbrush that can play games or display educational content while brushing. The toothbrush can have a built-in screen or display content through a companion app. This can make brushing teeth more enjoyable and engaging for children and adults alike.

Customizable Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush with interchangeable heads or handles, allowing users to customize their toothbrush to suit their preferences. Users can choose from different colors, designs, or even scents, making brushing more enjoyable and personalized. The toothbrush can also have a built-in timer and pressure sensor for proper brushing technique.
